title: Murder and Magic
description: This is the first Ace printing.Cover Artist: Robert AdragnaContents:1 • The Eyes Have It • [Lord Darcy] • (1964) • novelette by Randall Garrett 63 • A Case of Identity • [Lord Darcy] • (1964) • novella by Randall Garrett 158 • The Muddle of the Woad • [Lord Darcy] • (1965) • novella by Randall Garrett 243 • A Stretch of the Imagination • [Lord Darcy] • (1973) • short story by Randall Garrett These four stories were first collected in this volume in 1979.
author: Randall Garrett
